item.title: Players
item.description:
Player details, such as hero and troop levels, are displayed on the player page. For additional information, click one of the buttons in the top-right corner to access pages with detailed statistics on recent Clan Wars and the Legends League.

Search players

To search a player, click on the button in the bottom right corner of the players page. You can search players by tag or by name. The search by name is based on data provided by the ClashKing Discord bot and may not include all players.

The image below shows where you can find the player tag. Click on your experience (1) to open your profile (2), and then copy the tag (3) below your name.

Bookmark players

Bookmark your favorite players by clicking the bookmark button in the top-right corner of their detail page. To remove a bookmark, simply click the button again or swipe the player entry in your bookmarks list to the left or right. You can also rearrange your bookmarks to keep them organized: tap and hold any item, then drag it to the desired position.

Details

Legend League

This page displays the player’s Legend League performance for the current and previous seasons.

Attacks

This page provides a complete history of all clan war and CWL attacks and defenses of the player. Use the filter at the top to include or exclude friendly wars.

Stats

The Stats page presents aggregated war and CWL performance statistics over a selected time period.

Previous Clans

This page shows previous clans the player has been a member of and the total time spent in each clan.

Achievements

The Achievements page displays the player’s progress across all in-game achievements, organized by category (Home Village, Builder Base, Clan Capital).

item.title: Clans
item.description:
Clan details, such as a list of all members and the number of wins, losses, and ties in clan wars, are displayed on the clan page. For additional information, click one of the buttons in the top-right corner to access pages with detailed statistics on recent Clan Wars and the Legends League.

Search clans

To search a clan, click on the button in the bottom right corner of the clans page. You can search clans by tag or by name.

The image below shows where you can find the clan tag. Click on your experience (1) to open your profile, then click on your clan (2), and then copy the tag (3) below your name.

Bookmark clans

Bookmark your favorite clans by clicking the bookmark button in the top-right corner of their detail page. To remove a bookmark, simply click the button again or swipe the clan entry in your bookmarks list to the left or right. You can also rearrange your bookmarks to keep them organized: tap and hold any item, then drag it to the desired position.

Details

War log

This page displays the clan’s Clan War war and CWL results.

Stats

The Stats page presents aggregated war and CWL performance statistics over a selected time period for the clan and all of its members.

Raid Weekend

This page tracks your clan’s Clan Capital performance, showing detailed statistics for each raid weekend.

item.title: Clan Wars
item.description:
The war tab displays ongoing clan wars of your bookmarked players and clans. Use the filter in the top right corner if you only want to see specific war types. You can also remove clans or players for which you don’t want to see ongoing wars. If you have many bookmarks, loading the list may take longer, so use the filter to select the wars you are interested in. As soon as a player or clan is at war, you will also find a button at the bottom of the player or clan page that will take you to the clan war page.


For friendly wars and regular clan wars, your clan must have a public war log. If your war log is private, ask your leader to change the clan settings. For the Clan War League, a public war log is not required.

Past wars

The app also provides details of past clan wars. Simply click on an entry in the war log to view them. The data is provided by the ClashKing Discord bot. Please note that some clan wars may not have been tracked by ClashKing.

item.title: Clan War League
item.description:
If a clan war belongs to the Clan War League, you will find a button at the bottom of the clan war page that will take you to the clan war league page. For additional information about a clan or player, click on an item in the group or player list.

Past seasons

The app also provides details of past Clan War League seasons. Simply click on an entry in the war log to view them. The data is provided by the ClashKing Discord bot. Please note that some Clan War League months may not have been tracked by ClashKing.

item.title: Clan Capital
item.description: Click the menu button in the top right corner of the clan page to access this information. This page tracks your clan’s Clan Capital performance, showing detailed statistics for each raid weekend. The Summary tab displays overall metrics and the attacks of your members. You can switch to the Attacks or Defenses tabs to see details about the performance of clans and districts.

item.title: Legend League
item.description:
Click the button in the top right corner of the clan page to access this information. This page displays the player’s Legend League performance for the current and previous seasons. It shows trophies gained and lost per day along with a graph visualizing trophy progression throughout the month.


The information may not include all attacks and defenses. The app only tracks players while they are in the top 200 of their country.

item.title: Account
item.description:
Creating an account in the app settings unlocks additional features.

Cross-Device Sync

Your bookmarked players, clans, and other settings are automatically synchronized across all devices where you’re signed in. This makes it easy to switch between your phone and tablet without losing track of your favorite clans and players.

Notifications

Accounts enable push notifications to keep you informed about important clan activities. For example, you will receive a notification if you still need to attack in war, helping you never miss your chance to contribute. Notification preferences can be customized in the app settings to match your needs.
